crawledImageUrls.text:
So hey everyone, I?ve been working on this space survival map.
100% clearable and end dimension is accessible.
And I?ve also added some fun touches to make the gameplay interesting.
Hope you like the map : )

title: Frostbourne Plains Castle: Kingdom Update
briefDescription: An old medieval castle made for the early versions of Pocket Edition, rebuilt, remodeled, and redecorated to be practical in a new Bedrock Edition 1.16 world. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
An old medieval castle made for the early versions of Pocket Edition, rebuilt, remodeled, and redecorated to be practical in a new Bedrock Edition 1.16 world.
As I continued to expand this world, I decided to officially declare this a kingdom, starting by colonizing the nearby villages
So it?s a small castle originally built by an unknown player from a Minecraft builder app, but I redecorated it with the new Minecraft features to make it functional even without the use of redstone for the current versions of Minecraft. I also decorated it with the Frostbourne banner from Rainimator?s Fractures series to honor him and to make this world a human settlement.

It?s actually a practical fortress capable of fending off mobs, but isn?t good against enemy players. Since it?s populated by many villagers, a raid can occur, although the castle gives you a massive advantage as raiders are only used to raiding small villages, and they lack proper siege equipment against castles. I also placed a sugar cane farm and a nether portal just outside the castle.
There?s a nearby colonized village just in front of the castle, so the villagers in there will serve as good peasants as long as they?re treated properly.
Inside the Nether, there is a Crimson Forest and a hole with ladders that will take you to the bedrock level where you can mine ancient debris.

Kingdom update: I decided to rename this world to Frostbourne Kingdom, and I made it a kingdom starting by colonizing the neighbouring Savannah village inorder to expand the size of the kingdom, a similar tactic used by the Villager Kingdom from Mr.FudgeMonkeyz?s Annoying Villagers. I?ll also colonize other unexplored villages if possible, or you can just do it yourself.
You must first cross an acacia bridge to visit the place.
The village is relatively small village populated mostly by animals.

In the original village, I added a Golem Totem, a magical totem with the power to summon an Iron Golem, greatly upgrading the village?s defense system against mobs. Although the golems summoned by this are neutral towards players, and shouldn?t be messed with.

title: Cactus Block
briefDescription: Is Minecraft a little bit too cold? Do you need a warm desert island with prickly cactuses, that you have to survive off of? If ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Is Minecraft a little bit too cold? Do you need a warm desert island with prickly cactuses, that you have to survive off of? If so, this map is for you.
In this skyblock map, you must try to survive off of cactuses. This map includes a behavior pack that adds cactus planks, which can be used in place of wood planks. Sandstone can also be used in place of cobblestone in most recipes.

There are also ways to turn cacti into other essential materials in minecraft, such as cobblestone, crops, and string. Every 15 minutes, there will be a sandstorm, which provides renewable sand, but can also destroy your cactus farm if you don?t have a roof.

title: Az3?s Survival Disaster
briefDescription: Welcome to a new minigame which the only goal to this game is to survive from the 20 fatal challenges someone has set. Whoever is the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to a new minigame which the only goal to this game is to survive from the 20 fatal challenges someone has set. Whoever is the last one alive wins the game!
MAP DESCRIPTION:
Survival Disaster is a minigame that features an arena and 20 challenges for challengers like you. Challengers will survive these challenges and whoever is the last one standing will win the competition. Or else if everyone dies, a person with the highest accuracy will be chosen as a winner.
MAP MANUAL:
You will spawn in a spawn area which includes 5 rooms: Game Initializer, Information, Credits, Developer?s Access and a Secret Room.
MAP IMAGES:

crawledImageUrls.text:

Your mission is to collect all the heads and finally the ender dragon egg.

This map is an underwater, foggy map which consists of surviving underwater gathering resources to get all the heads back and finally defeat the ender dragon.
To get the heads you will need to explore the underwater and find the diferent temples were there are different monsters and prices.

title: Enhanced Biomes Survival
briefDescription: You want to play Minecraft Bedrock in Survival Mode, but with a more realistic environment? On this map you will find lots of little improvements ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
You want to play Minecraft Bedrock in Survival Mode, but with a more realistic environment? On this map you will find lots of little improvements to the landscape, from the top of the mountains, to the sandy dunes in front of a lighthouse. But even beyond the edited area, you will find a diverse variety of auto-generated Minecraft biomes, which make this seed ideal for playing survival mode.
Enhanced biomes: Village, Beach, Mountains, Swamp and Plains, which have been redesigned with birch and oak forests.
But that?s not all, there are some secret places to discover and maybe some hidden treasures? Even if this is true, they cannot be reached without putting yourself in danger!

title: Swamp Light Village
briefDescription: So this is one of my worlds that I play in. It is the oldest surviving world I have, it has been around since the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
So this is one of my worlds that I play in. It is the oldest surviving world I have, it has been around since the very early days of the beta versions of 1.14. It is a swamp village built close to my spawn. It used to be a single witch hut until I killed the owner and built my own village.
So it is a medium sized village with a relatively large population of villagers with a thriving economy. The village is full of fences and light sources, protecting them from outside threats. Zombies and Raiders have a difficult time trying to get in.
The structures consist of farm houses, a council hall, some farmlands, a butcher shop, a big house, several small huts, a small garden, a desert hut, a medieval bath tub, and an outhouse.
Theres also a small fortress of blackstone located on the land near the swamp that serves as your house, you don?t want to live in the village as the villagers would steal your bed.

As I continued my adventures, I went back to the Nether. Sadly, since I entered this world pre-1.16, the Nether consists mostly of nether wastes and no ancient debris can be found close to the portal, I had to build a fake warped forest to trick myself of hope. But luckily for me, there?s a large nether fortress nearby, and as you explore the fortress, you?ll eventually reach a crimson forest, with a camp located nearby that protects against both hoglins and zoglins. There?s also a long bridge that connects it to a real warped forest and a piglin bastion further away.
New features:
Barracks ? For storing weapons, armor, potions, and any other items useful for warfare

Nether Hut ? Found in the Crimson forest, it?s a small safehouse with countermeasures for Piglins and Hoglins.
Note:
1. Achievements cannot be earned in this world, as I used structure blocks and MCPE master to build this world in the past.
2. This world has the colorful mutant wolves addon but without the resource pack. The two wolves sisters, Jaiden and Elizabeth are sitting in the council hall. Sneak to stand them up, they are mighty beasts capable of bringing down most mobs on their own. Please handle them with care.

3. The weapons, armor, and other items used to be diamond tools edited by MCPE Master months ago. They are currently upgraded into netherite tools.
4. The designs might look weird and unusual to some.
5. The village is decorated with banners, mostly the Frostbourne banner from Rainimator?s Fracture series, a modified Mojang banner, and Pewdiepie?s Swedish flag.

title: IronAgate?s Skyblock Lite
briefDescription: There are so many complicated modded skyblock maps these days? Skyblock Lite is bringing it back to the basics! Spawn in an infinite void with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
There are so many complicated modded skyblock maps these days? Skyblock Lite is bringing it back to the basics! Spawn in an infinite void with limited resources and see how long you can survive!
Skyblock Lite is going back to the basics! You spawn on a grassy island with a tree and a chest. Nearby is a tiny desert island with obsidian to travel to the nether. Through the portal you will find a soul sand island in a giant 2k by 2k nether void! Be careful though, there are floating nether fortresses and lava clusters. Good luck and have fun!

title: Simple Survival Cabins

crawledImageUrls.text:
Don?t want to start a survival world with nothing? Don?t like building bases? Well, do I have a world for you! Simple Survival Cabins includes a main base with all the basic necessities and more!
Simple Survival Includes:
-A main house with multiple furnaces, all tools, a full set of leather armour, a bed, a double chest, a single chest on the second floor, and some other special resources.
-A storage house that has four double chests.
-A dock connected to a nearby river with a boat.
-A nearby village.

title: Acrait Acres
briefDescription: This map focuses on the simpler pleasures of Minecraft: farming, fishing, and trading with friendly villagers. You spawn before a small cabin where you'll start ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map focuses on the simpler pleasures of Minecraft: farming, fishing, and trading with friendly villagers.
You spawn before a small cabin where you?ll start your farming journey.
Inspired by Stardew Valley!
Since the map focuses on farming, you will be given a few tools and seeds in the beginning to expand your farm. Visit the villagers and trade with them in a upgraded village!
The world offers you a home, a mine, a lake, a village, and a few hidden secrets.

Features:

If you?re interested to see more serious/less jokey content by me, visit www.jigarbov.net for more cool Minecraft stuff? Want to support me? Head over to the Minecraft Marketplace where I do much more than small maps like this including huge adventures and more! Just search for ?Jigarbov?

title: Mushroomland Adventure
briefDescription: Spawning on a small island in the middle of the ocean, your mission will be to find a house with the basics and survive in ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Spawning on a small island in the middle of the ocean, your mission will be to find a house with the basics and survive in this place.
You are welcome, small and noble adventurer, to this small but huge world, where the laws of physics and biology do not apply.
For some strange but disturbing reason you are the only ?human? inhabitant of this place.
This wonderful and magical world is tormented by the forces of darkness, which threaten to consume and torment everything that comes in their way.
Your mission is simply to survive and explore this wonderful world, while defeating the dangerous creatures of the night.
Do you think you can handle that?
Do you think you can survive in the face of these dangerous creatures?
Let?s hope so? Don?t worry, we wish you good luck.
You will appear in a small island in the middle of the ocean, where you will find insufficient resources to start (XP), so you will have to swim around the ocean looking for its surroundings until you find a ?small? mushroom-cow island.
When you reach the island you will have to look for a small house that contains two chests, these contain basic items to start exploring.

The two chests contain:
? Wooden tools as well as a wooden sword to protect you.
? A being of full leather armor to protect you.
? Charcoal and other items that will serve you in your adventure.
You will have a bed, oven and table of creation.
Searching through the caves you will find many caves, in one cave you will find near the entrance a spawner of normal spiders, which will serve you to obtain thread and spider eyes for potions.
For more fun, two villages were added, on the edge of the island.
In a nearby forest, a tower has been added to serve as a boss, in which you will find chests with rewards to continue your adventure.
